definition: to make into/to change into/-ization/to ... -ize/to transform/abbr. for 化學|化学[hua4 xue2]

sentences.english: It remains a historical mission for China to accelerate the process of urbanization, which will enable the nation to move towards moderate prosperity.
sentences.chinese: 大力推进城市化，是中国奔向小康社会的历史重任。

sentences.english: But economic reform and mass urbanization in the last 30 years have upended these norms.
sentences.chinese: 但过去30年的经济改革和大规模城市化颠覆了这些。

sentences.english: Village-in-city is a huge obstacle in the development of urbanization in China.
sentences.chinese: 城中村问题是中国城市化进程的一大障碍。

sentences.english: He sees a trend toward "de-urbanization" across America.
sentences.chinese: 他发现美国正在出现逆城市化的趋势。

sentences.english: At the same time, Asia's rapid urbanization has gobbled up fecund farmland.
sentences.chinese: 与此同时，亚洲快速的城市化已占用大量高产农田。

sentences.english: Party construction is a new task in the process of urbanization.
sentences.chinese: 社区党建工作是城市化推进过程中出现的一个新课题。

sentences.english: Countries and regions all over the world face the challenge of urbanization.
sentences.chinese: 全球各地的国家和地区都面临城市化的挑战。

sentences.english: More and more of the soil resources were occupied by the rapid urbanization in the Yangtse Delta.
sentences.chinese: 随着城市化的加速发展，越来越多的土壤资源被侵占。

sentences.english: Xinjin country is a outer peri-urban in south Chengdou.
sentences.chinese: 新津县是成都南边的外圈半城市化地区。

sentences.english: China is the most rapidly urbanising country in the most rapidly urbanising region in Asia.
sentences.chinese: 中国是亚洲地区城市化最快的国家。

sentences.english: The ongoing urbanization process is ceaselessly moving forward in China.
sentences.chinese: 中国的城市化正在风起云涌地展开。

sentences.english: Urbanization carries the basic policy implication of W. A. Lewis' Dualistic Economic Crowth Theory. M. P.
sentences.chinese: 城市化是刘易斯二元经济发展理论的基本政策含义。

sentences.english: With the accelerating of urbanization, land-expropriated farmers(LEF) are increasing fast.
sentences.chinese: 随着城市化进程的加快，出现大量被征地农民。

sentences.english: Conclusion The suburb of Qingdao were urbanized, the prevalence of DM in which was near urban districts.
sentences.chinese: 结论青岛市近郊区城市化，DM患病率接近市区。

sentences.english: It is becoming urbanised on a scale unprecedented in history.
sentences.chinese: 它正在进行的城市化，其规模史无前例。

sentences.english: Australia is one of the most urbanized countries in the world.
sentences.chinese: 澳大利亚是世界上城市化水平最高的国家之一。

definition: urbanization level (of a city or town)
modernization of industry, one of Deng Xiaoping's Four Modernizations
to reform and open to the outside world/refers to Deng Xiaoping's policies from around 1980
